Please be sure to read the following car.message: 请务必认真阅读以下内容

Automated collection of protocol and dri.message: 无论是协议规定的数据，还是驱动返回值，Shifu都能自动采集

Open source with limitless cloud carrier.message: Shifu的核心代码全部开源，让您避免供应商锁定。您更可以自由地选择让Shifu部署在企业内部，边缘云、私有云、混合云或公有云上

Built on Kubernetes, Shifu spares you th.message: Shifu基于Kubernetes的架构让你免去未来再次迁移的烦恼

As light as a Raspberry Pi! (2G RAM).message: 只需一个2G内存的树莓派就可以在生产环境跑起Shifu！

Compatible with all K8s-based cloud/edge.message: Shifu兼容所有基于k8s的云边协同框架（OpenYurt, KubeEdge等）

Billions level of device service scalabi.message: 基于k8s的架构让Shifu可以无限扩容，轻松处理亿级设备接入，连智慧城市项目都不在话下

Kubernetes native IoT development framew.message: 让开发产业场景像开发APP一样简单！

From robots to thermometers.message: 大到使用私有驱动的工程机械

From proprietary to standard protocols.message: 小到使用标准协议的温湿度计

Shifu's high compatibility design makes.message: Shifu超高兼容性让你轻松应对各种异构设备

Devices and applications integrated into.message: 接入到Shifu 的设备和应用都会被封装成乐高式的模块

You can conjure up a unique substrate 10.message: 你可以用这些模块搭出一个与场景完美适配的开发框架

Capabilities of the device integrated in.message: 接入设备后，Shifu会自动把设备的能力抽象成API

Completely decoupling your application f.message: 让你的应用和硬件设备彻底解耦

Making IoT application development as ef.message: 让低效的物联网应用开发变得像手机应用开发一样高效

Shifu has been validated under aerospace.message: Shifu已经通过航天场景验证

Ensuring 99.9999% availability with buil.message: 使用内置备份技术，保证99.99999%高可用性

Designed by ex-security team of United N.message: 联合国前云原生安全团队操刀

From data encryption to network security.message: 从数据加密到网络安全

Shifu is on duty 24x7.message: Shifu时刻为您的安全保驾护航

Benefiting from cloud-native software ec.message: 得益于Kubernetes原生架构, Shifu得以无缝接入强大的云原生软件生态

You can draw on the wisdom of global dev.message: 让全球开发者的智慧结晶都为你所用

2.1 Run following command in Linux/Windo.message: 2.1 在Linux/Windows/Mac的命令行中执行以下命令

1. Select your OS to download Docker.message: 1. 请选择你的系统以下载Docker

1. Start an nginx instance to simulate t.message: 1. 启动一个nginx实例来模拟应用程序与Shifu的交互

2. Run the following command to check th.message: 2. 输入以下指令查看运行结果

3. If the following result appears, it m.message: 3. 如果出现以下结果，表示启动成功

Interact with the thermometer.message: 与温度计的数字孪生交互

Interact with the microplate reader.message: 与酶标仪的数字孪生交互

Interact with the robotic arm.message: 与机械臂的数字孪生交互

2.1 Use the following command to check t.message: 2.1 使用以下命令来查看运行效果

2.2 That all \"STATUS\" are Running mean.message: 2.2 如果所有 “STATUS“ 都是 Running 即表示成功

1. Run the following command to install.message: 1. 使用以下命令安装Shifu Demo

theme.ErrorPageContent.title.description: The title of the fallback page when the page crashed

theme.ErrorPageContent.tryAgain.description: The label of the button to try again when the page crashed

theme.NotFound.p1.message: 我们找不到您要找的页面。
theme.NotFound.p1.description: The first paragraph of the 404 page

theme.NotFound.p2.message: 请联系原始链接来源网站的所有者，并告知他们链接已损坏。

theme.admonition.note.description: The default label used for the Note admonition (:::note)

theme.admonition.tip.description: The default label used for the Tip admonition (:::tip)

theme.admonition.danger.description: The default label used for the Danger admonition (:::danger)

theme.admonition.info.description: The default label used for the Info admonition (:::info)

theme.admonition.caution.description: The default label used for the Caution admonition (:::caution)

theme.AnnouncementBar.closeButtonAriaLab.description: The ARIA label for close button of announcement bar

theme.BackToTopButton.buttonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the back to top button

theme.blog.paginator.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the blog pagination

theme.blog.paginator.newerEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the newer blog posts page (previous page)

theme.blog.paginator.olderEntries.description: The label used to navigate to the older blog posts page (next page)

theme.blog.archive.title.description: The page & hero title of the blog archive page

theme.blog.archive.description.description: The page & hero description of the blog archive page

theme.blog.post.paginator.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the blog posts pagination

theme.blog.post.paginator.newerPost.description: The blog post button label to navigate to the newer/previous post

theme.blog.post.paginator.olderPost.description: The blog post button label to navigate to the older/next post

theme.blog.post.plurals.description: Pluralized label for "{count} posts". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

theme.blog.tagTitle.description: The title of the page for a blog tag

theme.tags.tagsPageLink.description: The label of the link targeting the tag list page

theme.colorToggle.ariaLabel.message: 切换浅色/暗黑模式（当前为{mode}）
theme.colorToggle.ariaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the navbar color mode toggle

theme.colorToggle.ariaLabel.mode.dark.description: The name for the dark color mode

theme.colorToggle.ariaLabel.mode.light.description: The name for the light color mode

theme.docs.breadcrumbs.home.description: The ARIA label for the home page in the breadcrumbs

theme.docs.breadcrumbs.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the breadcrumbs

theme.docs.DocCard.categoryDescription.description: The default description for a category card in the generated index about how many items this category includes

theme.docs.paginator.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for the docs pagination

theme.docs.paginator.previous.description: The label used to navigate to the previous doc

theme.docs.paginator.next.description: The label used to navigate to the next doc

theme.docs.tagDocListPageTitle.nDocsTagg.description: Pluralized label for "{count} docs tagged". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

theme.docs.tagDocListPageTitle.description: The title of the page for a docs tag

theme.docs.versions.unreleasedVersionLab.message: 此为 {siteTitle} {versionLabel} 版尚未发行的文档。
theme.docs.versions.unreleasedVersionLab.description: The label used to tell the user that he's browsing an unreleased doc version

theme.docs.versions.unmaintainedVersionL.message: 此为 {siteTitle} {versionLabel} 版的文档，现已不再积极维护。
theme.docs.versions.unmaintainedVersionL.description: The label used to tell the user that he's browsing an unmaintained doc version

theme.docs.versions.latestVersionSuggest.description: The label used to tell the user to check the latest version

theme.docs.versions.latestVersionLinkLab.description: The label used for the latest version suggestion link label

theme.common.editThisPage.description: The link label to edit the current page

theme.lastUpdated.atDate.description: The words used to describe on which date a page has been last updated

theme.lastUpdated.byUser.description: The words used to describe by who the page has been last updated

theme.lastUpdated.lastUpdatedAtBy.description: The sentence used to display when a page has been last updated, and by who

theme.navbar.mobileVersionsDropdown.labe.description: The label for the navbar versions dropdown on mobile view

theme.common.skipToMainContent.description: The skip to content label used for accessibility, allowing to rapidly navigate to main content with keyboard tab/enter navigation

theme.tags.tagsListLabel.description: The label alongside a tag list

theme.blog.sidebar.navAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for recent posts in the blog sidebar

theme.CodeBlock.copied.description: The copied button label on code blocks

theme.CodeBlock.copyButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label for copy code blocks button

theme.CodeBlock.copy.description: The copy button label on code blocks

theme.CodeBlock.wordWrapToggle.description: The title attribute for toggle word wrapping button of code block lines

theme.DocSidebarItem.toggleCollapsedCate.description: The ARIA label to toggle the collapsible sidebar category

theme.navbar.mobileLanguageDropdown.labe.description: The label for the mobile language switcher dropdown

theme.TOCCollapsible.toggleButtonLabel.description: The label used by the button on the collapsible TOC component

theme.blog.post.readingTime.plurals.description: Pluralized label for "{readingTime} min read". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

theme.blog.post.readMore.description: The label used in blog post item excerpts to link to full blog posts

theme.blog.post.readMoreLabel.description: The ARIA label for the link to full blog posts from excerpts

theme.docs.sidebar.collapseButtonTitle.description: The title attribute for collapse button of doc sidebar

theme.docs.sidebar.collapseButtonAriaLab.description: The title attribute for collapse button of doc sidebar

theme.navbar.mobileSidebarSecondaryMenu..description: The label of the back button to return to main menu, inside the mobile navbar sidebar secondary menu (notably used to display the docs sidebar)

theme.docs.sidebar.expandButtonTitle.description: The ARIA label and title attribute for expand button of doc sidebar

theme.docs.sidebar.expandButtonAriaLabel.description: The ARIA label and title attribute for expand button of doc sidebar

theme.SearchPage.existingResultsTitle.description: The search page title for non-empty query

theme.SearchPage.emptyResultsTitle.description: The search page title for empty query

theme.SearchPage.documentsFound.plurals.description: Pluralized label for "{count} documents found". Use as much plural forms (separated by "|") as your language support (see https://www.unicode.org/cldr/cldr-aux/charts/34/supplemental/language_plural_rules.html)

theme.SearchPage.noResultsText.description: The paragraph for empty search result

theme.SearchBar.label.description: The ARIA label and placeholder for search button

theme.tags.tagsPageTitle.description: The title of the tag list page

Shifu Brings mobile-app-development-expe.message: 让开发产业场景像开发APP一样简单！

Subscribe.message: 订阅 Shifu 最新资讯

Haidian, Beijing.message: 北京市 海淀区 中关村 创业大街 12号楼

An industrial IoT development framework.message: 面向产业的物联网开发框架，十倍提高物联网开发者效率

How to deploy Shifu on K3s to complete t.message: 如何在K3s上部署Shifu并实现云-边-端完整闭环

Empowering IoT development.message: Shifu实现极速设备接入，助力应用开发

Shifu helps us integrate all of our devi.message: Shifu帮助我们用智慧、有效的方式整合了所有这些设备，有了Shifu我们可以以软件对象的形式对待所有的设备，并且抽象出物理设备。

Shifu provides a new development model t.message: Shifu提供了新的开发模式，帮助工程开发人员根据用户的需求，快速转换业务上的认知，快速提出软件需求规格说明，完成场景开发。

The fusion-type intelligent IoT platform.message: 基于Shifu框架所开发的融合式智能物联中台，大幅提升了系统在生产环境中的兼容性和可靠性，为产线智能运维、操作智能防人因以及生产数据整合搭建了如磐石般坚韧的基座。

Head of the AI R&D Center at CNNC Equipm.message: 中核装备院人工智能研发中心负责人

As a IoT middleware, Shifu helps us achi.message: Shifu作为物联网中间件，用简洁、高效、安全、稳定的方式帮我们实现了云边端一体化的物联网架构。Shifu在中国船舶的场景里运行了较长时间，一直保持着稳定的表现。未来也期待Shifu能够帮助中国船舶更多的业务进行数字化转型。

Head of CSSC Environment IoT Department.message: 中船环境物联网负责人

Shifu is an important new infrastructure.message: Shifu是一个工业互联网业内的重要新基建，有潜力帮助众多新能源企业插上物联网的翅膀。我们公司拥有众多产业场景，也期待Shifu在我们的场景中有亮眼的表现。

CEO of OCSmarter.message: 零碳数科CEO、厦门国贸启润物联总经理
